title: Valhalla 01-08 (danish language)
description:
And time for yet another "Demonoid is back, let's celebrate" pack....this time just a collected pack of the scanned Valhalla comics so far.

DO notice these are in danish, i have also uploaded a pack of the scanlated Valhalla 1-6, so if you cant read danish, dont get this, but grab the english version instead, and wait for the release of the scanlated 7 and 8 :)

And if you can read danish, i should hopefully NOT need to explain anything to you. But in case some of you have lived in a cave the since 79, here are a rundown of the comics in this pack:
